content.rendered:
Directed by Ol Parker

Written by Ol Parker. Daniel Pipski

Star George Clooney(David). Sean Lynch(Rob). Julia Roberts(Georgia). Arielle Carver-O’Neill(Kimberley). Ling Cooper Tang(Auctioneer). Billie Lourd(Wren Butler). Kaitlyn Dever(Lily). Charles Allen(Dean). Maxime Bouttier(Gede). Francis McMahon(Artist). Geneviève Lemon(Beth-Ann). Romy Poulier(Lauren). Lucas Bravo(Paul). Dorian Djoudi(Komang). Ilma Nurfauziah(Dewi). Agung Pindha(Wayan). Ifa Barry(Suli). Cintya Dharmayanti(Losi). Nom Gunadi(Losi’s Uncle). Inaya Servais(Ketut). Ida Pandita Putu Wirata(Pedanda). Eduard Alexander Waloni(Kadek). Joshua Chan(Sleepy Bartender). Mia Amrisyanda(Rani). Anto Widjaja(Man in White). Casey Wright(Shaun). Rowan Chapman(Simon). Kyoko Yates(Emma). Christopher Hubac(Extra). Leo Castro(Squash Player (uncredited)). Vanesa Everett(Tourist (uncredited)). Ibrahim Isiktas((uncredited)). Murran Kain(Tourist / Plane Passenger (uncredited)). Senayt Mebrahtu(Dignitary (uncredited)). Amanda O’Dempsey(Tourist (uncredited)). Siobhan O’Shea(Tourist (uncredited)). Renee Petersen(Chicago Auction Attendee (uncredited)). Isaac Priest(Graduate (uncredited)). Rachel Sinclair(Tourist (uncredited)). Logan Skinner(Tourist / Plane Passenger (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Deborah Balderstone. Tim Bevan. George Clooney. Eric Fellner. Marisa Yeres Gill. Lisa Roberts Gillan. Sarah Harvey. Grant Heslov. Rebecca Miller. Julia Roberts. Kate Macey Wynborne

Production Universal Pictures. Working Title Films. Smokehouse Pictures
